In 2023, maternal mortality rates decreased significantly for White non-Hispanic (subsequently, 
White) and Hispanic women (Figure 2, Table). The observed decrease for Asian non-Hispanic 
(subsequently, Asian) and increase for Black non-Hispanic (subsequently, Black) women was not
